name: Rogue Entanglement
description:
The year is 20XX, you're a young researcher trying to build your own quantum computer. It's been a long and laborious journey, but you did it, YES!! You finally did it. You achieved entanglement, it's just a 2 qubits machine, but it's quite something. Later that night you notice something weird, there are some weird intermissions going on and if you don't do something. They're going to overheat your dilution refrigerator chambers and your qubits will decohere. How to Play

In each level you're trying to reach the exit. But you should keep in mind your heat levels and deal with heat sources to prevent decoherence.

  • Y and T - Rotate before moving.
  • Z and X - Flip before moving.
  • I - No rotation(default).
  • Arrow keys - Move qubits.
  • Mouse - Move windows

Movement consist of two parts: One operation(Y, T, Z, X or I ) and One move(arrows).

If you reach level 5, you win.

Credits
  • Quantum support.- minmin, Kenneth I. and Vishal_Bajpe
  • Music.- Stevia Sphere
  • Background image.- DESIGNECOLOGIST
